page.title: 09VILLAGE CLUBS
page.content: {JUNIOR CLUB Junior club is run by{Kathy.}It is held in the village hall at{6.00pm} each Wednesday. It ends at{8.00pm}. There are games and sometimes we go out into the park and play rounders or non stop cricket.We pay a subscription of{20p}each week and a{pound}each year. At one end of the hall there is a{fourth years'}room where the fourth years think up games for the little ones and just relax. {YOUTH CLUB It is run by{Rita.}It costs{Â£3.00}a year to be a member and you have to be eleven years old before you can join. The club operates on Tuesdays and Thursdays and some of the activities include{archery,snooker,table-tennis, {rounders and tennis.}Day trips are sometimes organised to sea-side resorts or parks.
